name: attestation-dashboard
docker_compose_file:
version: '3.8'

services:
  app:
    image: dylanckawalec/attestation-dashboard:latest
    container_name: tee-trust-validator
    ports:
      - "3000:3000"
      - "8000:8000"
      - "8001:8001"
    volumes:
      - /var/run/tappd.sock:/var/run/tappd.sock
      - /var/run/dstack.sock:/var/run/dstack.sock
      - ./logs:/app/logs
    environment:
      - PHALA_API_KEY=${PHALA_API_KEY}
      - PHALA_ENDPOINT=${PHALA_ENDPOINT}
      - PHALA_CLUSTER_ID=${PHALA_CLUSTER_ID}
      - PHALA_CONTRACT_ID=${PHALA_CONTRACT_ID}
      - APP_NAME=${APP_NAME}
      - DEVELOPER_NAME=${DEVELOPER_NAME}
      - DEVELOPER_ROLE=${DEVELOPER_ROLE}
      - ORGANIZATION=${ORGANIZATION}
      - NODE_ENV=production
      - TEE_ENVIRONMENT=production
      - ENABLE_MOCK_MODE=false
      - REQUIRE_ATTESTATION=true
      - ATTESTATION_SEED=${ATTESTATION_SEED}
      - ATTESTATION_SALT=${ATTESTATION_SALT}
      - PORT=3000
      - API_PORT=8000
      - BUN_PORT=8001
    restart: always
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost:3000/"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
      start_period: 60s
